Write 2-4 short & energetic sentences to: Write 2-4 short & energetic sentences to interest the reader! Mention your role, experience & most importantly - your biggest achievements, best qualities and skills.
Recruiter tip: write 400-600 characters: Recruiter tip: write 400-600 characters to increase interview chances
Show your relevant experience (last 10 y: Show your relevant experience (last 10 years). Use bullet points to note your achievements, if possible - use numbers/facts (Achieved X, measured by Y, by doing Z).
A varied education on your resume sums u: A varied education on your resume sums up the value that your learnings and background will bring to job.
You can add links to websites you want h: You can add links to websites you want hiring managers to see! Perhaps It will be a link to your portfolio, LinkedIn profile, or personal website
Label: Label
Choose 5 important skills that show you: Choose 5 important skills that show you fit the position. Make sure they match the key skills mentioned in the job listing (especially when applying via an online system).
